#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <list>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
unsigned int match(const char *str1,const char *str2);
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    unsigned int numoftestcases;
    unsigned int count=0,count1 =0;
    scanf("%d",&numoftestcases);
    list<string> lst;
    string str;
    
    for(unsigned int i=0;i<numoftestcases;i++)
    {
	
        //scanf("%s",str[i].c_str());
	cin>>str;
        lst.push_back(str);
    }
    lst.sort();
    
    list<string>::iterator p = lst.begin();
    list<string>::iterator q = lst.begin();
     

//     cout<<"print over"<<endl;	
     for(unsigned int i=0;i<numoftestcases-1;i++)
    {
      q++;
  //    cout<<"Comparing "<<*p<<"and "<<*q<<endl;	 
      count1 = match((*p).c_str(),(*q).c_str());
//      printf("%d\n",count1);	
      if(count1>count)  
        count = count1;
      p++;

    }


    printf("%d\n",count);
    return 0;
}
unsigned int match(const char *str1,const char *str2)
{
    unsigned int ret =0;
    unsigned int len;
    if(strlen(str1)<strlen(str2))
        len =strlen(str1);
    else
        len = strlen(str2);
    for(unsigned int k=0;k<len;k++)
        if(str1[k] == str2[k])
            ret++;
        else
            break;
    return ret;
}
